Title: [GPS Manager][Vehicle Panel]Verify that User can select vehicle and load right panel successfully
Description: Select vehicle to activate right panel with vehicle information
Steps: 1. Locate vehicle VEH-3500 in vehicle list; 2. Click on vehicle VEH-3500 to select; 3. Wait for right panel loading process; 4. Verify panel activation and visibility; 5. Check vehicle number display in panel; 6. Confirm dropdown menu availability; 7. Validate panel functionality is ready
Expected Result: 1. Vehicle VEH-3500 is visible and selectable in list; 2. Vehicle selection triggers right panel activation; 3. Right panel loading process initiates; 4. Panel becomes visible and active; 5. Vehicle No: VEH-3500 is displayed prominently; 6. Dropdown menu is available and functional; 7. Right panel is fully loaded and ready for interaction

Title: [GPS Manager][Initial State]Verify that User can view dropdown default state successfully
Description: Check dropdown behavior when no geofence is selected
Steps: 1. Locate dropdown menu in right panel; 2. Click on dropdown menu; 3. Observe dropdown content display; 4. Check for empty state messaging; 5. Verify no data entries are present; 6. Confirm dropdown closes properly; 7. Validate initial state behavior
Expected Result: 1. Dropdown menu is visible and accessible; 2. Dropdown opens when clicked; 3. Dropdown content shows empty state; 4. Appropriate empty state message is displayed; 5. No geofence data entries are visible; 6. Dropdown closes when clicked outside; 7. Initial state behavior is consistent and user-friendly

Title: [GPS Manager][Timestamp Display]Verify that User can view geofence in-out timestamps successfully
Description: Add geofences and verify timestamp display in dropdown
Steps: 1. Add multiple geofences to selected vehicle VEH-3500; 2. Wait for geofence data processing; 3. Click on dropdown menu; 4. Verify timestamp entries appear; 5. Check in and out time display; 6. Confirm chronological ordering; 7. Validate timestamp format and accuracy
Expected Result: 1. Multiple geofences are successfully added to vehicle; 2. Geofence data processing completes; 3. Dropdown menu opens showing timestamp data; 4. All geofence timestamp entries are visible; 5. Both in and out times are displayed for each geofence; 6. Timestamps are arranged in chronological order; 7. Timestamp format is consistent and accurate throughout

Title: [GPS Manager][Data Sorting]Verify that User can view chronologically sorted geofence crossings successfully
Description: Validate crossing sort order in dropdown
Steps: 1. Open dropdown with multiple geofence entries; 2. Review first geofence timestamp; 3. Compare with subsequent entries; 4. Verify time-based progression; 5. Check chronological accuracy; 6. Confirm sorting consistency; 7. Validate complete sort order
Expected Result: 1. Dropdown opens showing multiple geofence entries; 2. First geofence shows earliest timestamp; 3. Subsequent entries show progressively later times; 4. Time-based progression is maintained throughout; 5. Chronological accuracy is verified across all entries; 6. Sorting remains consistent during interface interactions; 7. Complete sort order follows proper chronological sequence

Title: [GPS Manager][Job Information]Verify that User can view job and load details for vehicle successfully
Description: Show job and load details for selected vehicle
Steps: 1. Select vehicle with job history; 2. Wait for job data loading; 3. Locate job details section; 4. Expand job details section; 5. Verify job information displays; 6. Check load ID and metadata; 7. Confirm complete job information is accessible
Expected Result: 1. Vehicle with job history is selected successfully; 2. Job data loading completes; 3. Job details section is visible and accessible; 4. Job details section expands showing information; 5. Job information displays with all relevant data; 6. Load ID and metadata are clearly shown; 7. Complete job information including history is accessible

Title: [GPS Manager][Route Details]Verify that User can expand job to view geofence activity successfully
Description: Show detailed job route and geofence crossing information
Steps: 1. Locate specific job entry in list; 2. Click on Show Details button; 3. Wait for detail loading process; 4. Verify job path information loads; 5. Check geofence crossing timing; 6. Confirm additional data display; 7. Validate complete route details
Expected Result: 1. Specific job entry is visible in job list; 2. Show Details button click triggers detail view; 3. Detail loading process completes successfully; 4. Job path information is displayed clearly; 5. Geofence crossing times are shown accurately; 6. Additional geofence crossing data is visible; 7. Complete route details with timing are accessible

Title: [GPS Manager][Sort Validation]Verify that User can view properly sorted job geofence crossings successfully
Description: Validate chronological order of job-specific geofence crossings
Steps: 1. Open job details view; 2. Locate geofence crossing timestamps; 3. Review first crossing timestamp; 4. Compare with subsequent crossings; 5. Verify chronological progression; 6. Check time-based sorting accuracy; 7. Confirm proper sort order maintenance
Expected Result: 1. Job details view opens showing crossing data; 2. Geofence crossing timestamps are visible; 3. First crossing shows earliest time; 4. Subsequent crossings show progressively later times; 5. Chronological progression is maintained; 6. Time-based sorting is accurate throughout; 7. Proper sort order is maintained consistently

Title: [GPS Manager][Loading States]Verify that User can view skeleton animation in detail panel successfully
Description: Verify loading animation appears during data fetch
Precondition: Vehicle or job selected for details
Steps: 1. Click on Show Details in right panel; 2. Observe initial loading state; 3. Verify skeleton animation appears; 4. Monitor animation behavior; 5. Wait for data loading completion; 6. Confirm animation disappears; 7. Validate smooth transition to loaded state
Expected Result: 1. Show Details click triggers loading sequence; 2. Initial loading state is immediately visible; 3. Skeleton animation appears and runs smoothly; 4. Animation provides clear loading feedback; 5. Data loading completes successfully; 6. Skeleton animation disappears when loading done; 7. Smooth transition occurs from loading to loaded state

Title: [GPS Manager][Empty States]Verify that User can view appropriate message when no vehicle selected successfully
Description: View right panel behavior when no vehicle is selected
Precondition: Initial state with no vehicle selection
Steps: 1. Ensure no vehicle is currently selected; 2. Observe right panel content; 3. Check dropdown menu state; 4. Verify empty state message; 5. Confirm instructional text appears; 6. Check panel layout and styling; 7. Validate user guidance messaging
Expected Result: 1. No vehicle selection is confirmed; 2. Right panel shows appropriate empty state; 3. Dropdown menu indicates no data available; 4. Clear empty state message is displayed; 5. Instructional text guides user to select vehicle; 6. Panel layout remains consistent and professional; 7. User guidance messaging is helpful and clear
